import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import axios from "axios"; import useSwr from 'swr'; import "./styles/UserInfoModal.scss"; interface Iprops{ open: any, close: any, myID: string, targetID: string, profile: {history:{win:boolean, p2:string}[] ,friend:boolean, block:boolean, win:number, lose:number} | {history:{win:boolean, p2:string}[], win:number, lose:number} } const UserInfoModal = ( props: Iprops ) => { const { open, close, myID, targetID, profile} = props; async function makeDM(){ if (myID.localeCompare(targetID) < 0) var chatRoomName = 'DM_' + myID + '_' + targetID else var chatRoomName = 'DM_' + targetID + '_' + myID await axios.put('/Lobby/chatCreate/' + chatRoomName, {password:'', owner_id:myID, security:'private'}) document.location.href = '/chat' sessionStorage.setItem('roomName', chatRoomName) } return (
{ open ? (
{targetID}
W {profile?.win}    L {profile?.lose}
{profile?.history?.map(match=>
{match.p2} {match.win ? 'Win' : 'Lose'}
)}
{myID === targetID ? document.location.href = '/Admin/'}>Admin :
Game DM
}
) : null }
) } export default UserInfoModal
